flavorText:
"In ages past, bargains were struck and promises were made. Now we must collect on our debt. Begin the hymns."
—Moruul, Khalni druid

foreignData.flavorText: „In vergangenen Zeiten wurden Abkommen getroffen und Versprechungen gemacht. Jetzt müssen wir diese Schulden eintreiben. Beginnt mit den Hymnen!" —Moruul, Khalni-Druide
foreignData.name: Khalni-Hydra
foreignData.text:
Die Khalni-Hydra kostet beim Wirken für jede grüne Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, {G} weniger.
Verursacht Trampelschaden

foreignData.flavorText: "En tiempos pasados, se cumplían las promesas y los tratos. Ahora debemos cobrar nuestra deuda. Que comiencen los himnos." —Moruul, druida de Khalni
foreignData.name: Hidra de Khalni
foreignData.text:
Cuesta {G} menos lanzar la Hidra de Khalni por cada criatura verde que controles.
Arrolla.

foreignData.flavorText: « Jadis, des marchés furent passés et des promesses, faites. Désormais, nous devons réclamer notre dû. Chantez les hymnes. » —Moruul, druide de Khalni

foreignData.flavorText: "Nei tempi antichi, si strinsero accordi e si fecero promesse. Ora dobbiamo raccogliere i nostri debiti. Inizia con gli inni." —Moruul, druido di Khalni
foreignData.name: Idra di Khalni

L'Idra di Khalni costa {G} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni creatura verde che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 「何世代も前、取引が行われ、盟約が成された。 今や我々が負うた債を返すときだ。 聖歌を。」 ――カルニのドルイド、モルール

foreignData.flavorText: «Давным-давно были заключены сделки и даны обещания. А теперь мы должны востребовать нам причитающееся. Начинайте петь гимны». — Моруул, друид Кални

foreignData.flavorText: 「在很久以前，交易已谈妥、承诺已表明。 现在我们该去收债了。 开始诵咒。」 ～坎尼德鲁伊摩路

你每操控一个绿色生物，坎尼多头龙便减少{G}来施放。
践踏

name: Khalni Hydra
originalText:
Khalni Hydra costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control.
Trample

rulings.text: For the purpose of determining the cost reduction, the number of green creatures you control is checked as you cast Khalni Hydra, before your last chance to activate mana abilities to pay for it. For example, if you control Wild Cantor (a red and green creature with the ability “Sacrifice Wild Cantor: Add one mana of any color.”) as you cast Khalni Hydra, first the cost to cast Khalni Hydra is reduced by {G}, then you could sacrifice Wild Cantor for mana to help pay for it.
Khalni Hydra’s cost reduction effect doesn’t change its mana cost or converted mana cost.

If an effect (such as the one from Lodestone Golem) imposes an additional generic mana cost to casting Khalni Hydra, the Hydra’s ability will reduce it too. It’ll reduce the amount of green mana you need to spend first, though.

text:
